text: William Vogel Bidwill Sr. (July 31, 1931 â€“ October 2, 2019) was an American businessman, philanthropist, and the owner of the Arizona Cardinals of the National Football League (NFL). He had co-owned the team from 1962 for ten seasons with his brother Charles Jr. and had been sole owner from 1972 until his death in 2019. Bidwill died at age 88 on October 2, 2019 in Phoenix, Arizona. ==References== ==Other websites== * Arizona Cardinals bio Category:1931 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Philanthropists from Chicago Category:Businesspeople from Chicago Category:Businesspeople from Phoenix, Arizona
title: Bill Bidwill
